Privacy Policy

1. 2. 6. User Rights You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. If you wish to exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.
7. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the updated policy on our application.

Welcome to StuntingDetection: Early Detection of Stunting

At Stunting Detection, we are dedicated to addressing a critical global health issue: growth stunting in children. Our mission is to utilize cutting-edge technology to provide early and accessible detection of stunting, empowering early childhood development centers and caregivers to take timely action.

Our Vision

Growth stunting is a severe and pervasive health problem that affects millions of children worldwide. It results from inadequate nutrition, repeated infections, and insufficient psychosocial stimulation, leading to both immediate and long-term health challenges. Our vision is to harness the power of machine learning and mobile technology to offer an innovative solution that can make a tangible difference in combating this issue.

What We Do

GrowthGuard leverages advanced machine learning algorithms and mobile cameras to analyze visual data and identify signs of growth stunting. Our mobile application is designed to be user-friendly and accessible, enabling users to detect stunting with ease and accuracy. The app provides:

Visual Analysis: Using mobile cameras, our app analyzes images of children to detect physical signs of stunting.
Predictive Algorithms: Our system uses machine learning models to process data on height, weight, and visual indicators to predict stunting.
Early Alerts: The app generates alerts when signs of stunting are detected, allowing for timely intervention and support.

Our Approach

GrowthGuard is developed in partnership with the Western Cape Department of Health and researchers from the University of the Western Cape. We are committed to ethical practices and rigorous testing to ensure our app meets the highest standards of accuracy and reliability. Our goal is to provide a tool that is both effective and easy to use, making stunting detection accessible to all who need it.
